abstract: New York City Police Dept announces formation of new unit to patrol Times Square, focusing on quality-of-life issues; hopes to address problem of growing number of costumed characters and topless women who pose for pictures with tourists and aggressively solicit tips; unit is extension of neighborhood policing model that is being tested in several precincts around city.
lead_paragraph: The officers in the new unit will address quality-of-life concerns amid rising complaints over the costumed characters and topless women in the area’s pedestrian plazas.

headline.main: New York Police Dept. Creates Unit to Monitor Times Square Issues
headline.print_headline: New Policing Strategy to Expand to Times Sq.

snippet: The officers in the new unit will address quality-of-life concerns amid rising complaints over the costumed characters and topless women in the area’s pedestrian plazas.
